channel.title: Pages on PonyFest
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on PonyFest

item.title: Guests
item.description: Guests Jim Miller Big Jim is the former Supervising Series Director of MLP:FiM. He’s now working on a new series he can’t comment on yet, so don’t ask. He’s staying at home as much as possible during this global crisis, and so should you. Tony Fleecs Tony Fleecs is currently hard at work writing and drawing MY LITTLE PONY & STAR WARS comics for IDW Publishing.

item.title: Staff
item.description: Staff PonyFest Online could not have existed without the tireless (and frantic!) work of the following: Coordination Dexanth - Princess / Mom Events Simul - Lead MidnightDynasty - Staff Foal Papers - Staff A/V Larscis - Lead Video Lounge Fizzbuzz - Lead Gaming Leslie - Coordinator yokaimask - Coordinator Tabletop B.B. - Lead Design Screw Loose - Lead Dawnfire - Bit Rate’s Mom Viwrastupr - Staff Artist Social Media Kevin - Lead Kibbie - Memeposter Vendors Reuf - Lead Discord Ethereal Vision - Lead Web Katharine - Lead Special Thanks Joey Jamis Skygunner Gajinka
